website_summaries.verdict: The Epson WorkForce DS-520 Color Document Scanner offers a 50-sheet automatic document feeder, a capable scan utility, and fast speed.
cons: Fared only moderately well with business cards in our tests

customer_reviews.title: And it is a fine product. Epson WorkForce Scanner is FAR SUPERIOR
customer_reviews.text: Our firm used FUJITSU scanner for years. And it is a fine product. Epson WorkForce Scanner is FAR SUPERIOR, can easily network with the purchase of the Epson Network Interface unit, twain compliant, scan to the cloud and the cost for the scanner and network interface is last than the scansnap 1500. Epson WorkForce scanner are truly enterprise level at desktop prices. Affordable for small business. SEB
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great with Linux
customer_reviews.text: Epson has Linux drivers on their website (RPM or DEB). Install them and you can then interact with the scanner through their imagescan program. Worked no problem right out of the box, scanning a batch of notes to PDF. I'm running it under Fedora 24.
customer_reviews.author: MZ

customer_reviews.title: I had and really liked the 510
customer_reviews.text: This is the 510 model with upgraded guts and software. I had and really liked the 510, but the auto sheet feeder gunked out on me. I liked the 510 enough to buy the 520, if that says something. Both my assistant and office-mate also have 510's. The software is better in this version and it does everything I need -- I'm a lawyer and swamped with paperwork. Scanning it allows me to discard of un-needed paper keeping only critical hard-copy documents.
customer_reviews.author: Rossiferous

customer_reviews.title: Great Scanner, really good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great Scanner, really good for the price, you can make big documents without hesitating and worrying about the time. This one has a Page feeder of 50 paged and can scan 30ppm even when they are two sided. Totally Recommended for getting High Capacity Scans.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: It's alright. It gets the job done but very noisy. Also I ran into some technical difficulties that took a lot of time to solve. The resolution is not as it advertises and not as I wanted it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Brian MCDonald

customer_reviews.title: Tiny, but mighty.
customer_reviews.text: It is tiny, but works great. I was, and still am, amazed at how fast it scans both sides at the same time. It is pretty light weight and feels somewhat fragile, but works great.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Very good scanner.
customer_reviews.text: This scanner has worked extremely well for me. I use it often for work and have never had an issue. I've had it for close to a year. It was easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: L. B. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: I have been using this to transfer hard files to ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this to transfer hard files to digital and it is handling the workload extremely well. Figuring out settings is a little time consuming.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Augie Guardino

customer_reviews.title: Working great so far
customer_reviews.text: Working great so far. The only thing we are having trouble with is it is not scanning the HARD insurance cards, otherwise it is fast and effortless.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Whiting

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Medical Office
customer_reviews.text: Have a TWAIN EHR system at a medical office - these scanners are easy to install and inexpensive enough to put in every department. No more piles of incoming medical records waiting to be scanned into charts!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Small professional - suites our needs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: C Henry

customer_reviews.title: I love all of the functionality
customer_reviews.text: I love all of the functionality, searchable PDFs, IPhone compatible and good quality scans for our clean desk policy at the office
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Brodt

customer_reviews.title: Great scanner for those who need to scan lots quickly.
customer_reviews.text: It scans stacks of papers quickly and with ease. I love my little machine.
customer_reviews.author: N. C.

customer_reviews.title: Has correct drivers
customer_reviews.text: Has the correct drivers needed to work with our software. Saves receptionist a ton of time. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: OutdoorGuy1

customer_reviews.title: A magical little machine
customer_reviews.text: What a magical machine! Works great! I just got it last week, and I set it up and installed it myself in 20 minutes. easy peasy. I'm a forty-something years office admin clerk, I am mechanically inclined, I don't really know much about computers. I work for a small company. I decided to make it go paperless. I had about 5 sets of 3drawer file cabinet, this machine had changed my life. I scanned everything, pdf'ied. I'm paperless now, all in one week. I'm planning to buy another one for home too.
customer_reviews.author: Minaki Sakurai

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent product it performs like a Fujitsu but with a lower price tag
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the double sided scanning feature
customer_reviews.text: Set up was a little rough when applying my older applications to the new scanner. Very compact and quiet as it whips through documents. I love the double sided scanning feature!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Orgeron

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 8 pieces of them and all works perfectly. Great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would buy this again
customer_reviews.text: Really compact - great desktop scanner - easy to use
customer_reviews.author: J Niley Dorit

customer_reviews.title: I like that it is a fast feed but it does ...
customer_reviews.text: We use this at my office. I like that it is a fast feed but it does jam periodically if the document is too thick. Other than that, the quality of the scan is great too!
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: This scanner is perfect for our needs
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a busy dental office and also needed it to be compatible with our Dentrix software. This scanner is perfect for our needs! There aren't as many functions available as the Fuji Snap scanner but it's efficient enough.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Compact
customer_reviews.text: Just beginning to use, and seems to get the job done. Compact size appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Mapsie

customer_reviews.title: This scanner is working very fine for us
customer_reviews.text: This scanner is working very fine for us. We have a ScanSnap S1300i and a Plustek 288, they are all working every day, and each has features that we really like and wish were all incorporated in one machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Epson WorkForce is awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Thought I was a NEAT receipts loyal customer until I upgraded my MAC to OS X and had problems not being able to scan and the quality was awful. The Epson WorkForce is awesome!!! and works better and faster than my neat ever did. Plus, I'm still able to use my Neat Filing Cabinet with my Epson WorkForce scanner. The quality of the scans are much better too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 wide and will not scan 11 x 17 like it says in the information
customer_reviews.text: the scanner is not 16.5 wide and will not scan 11 x 17 like it says in the information.
customer_reviews.author: harry botts

customer_reviews.title: Very nice document scanner
customer_reviews.text: Excellent scanner. Recently purchased for the purpose of archiving documents for a small business. Automatically discriminates color from black & white documents. In a first use, the scanner reliably fed stacks of 50 sheets totaling perhaps several thousand documents including mixed paper sizes of various kinds of paper including folder stock, lined school tablet paper, standard office stock and colored sketches on sketch paper. Simultaneously scans both sides and will, to a degree, ignore blank pages. The machine and its accompanying software are very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't scan taped receipts
customer_reviews.text: This won't scan receipts that are taped to a page, no matter how cleanly you do it. This causes me all kinds of problems. It does fine for pages that do not have taped receipts.
customer_reviews.author: PST

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Tech Support From EPSON
customer_reviews.text: Horrible Tech Support From EPSON.com. This unit will not work wirelessly because I did not have a laptop to set it up. It requires a laptop to do a setup, desktop can not do the setup,very poor job to make the installation easy. Exchanged it for Brother Image Center ADS 2800 W. It was such a easy setting up on screen menu. DO NOT BUY EPSON Scanners poor customer support non consumer friendly setup.
customer_reviews.author: M. Davydov

product_meta.title: Epson WorkForce DS-520 Sheet-Fed Color Document Scanner for PC & MAC, Auto Document Feeder (ADF) & Duplex (B11B234201)
product_meta.description: The fast, versatile scanner for efficient document management. Scan at speeds up to 30 ppm/60 ipm. Compatible with existing software - TWAIN and ISIS drivers included. Compact design, featuring double-feed detection and 50-page ADF.
feature_bullets: Fast scan speeds - up to 30 ppm/60 ipm; scans both sides in just one pass
Compatible w/ popular third-party doc. mgmt. software - TWAIN & ISIS drivers
Reliable performance - 3 sets of rollers for dynamic skew correction, & more

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars40 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
